attributes.action: to ensure that only adults are charged adult prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under 18's are able to be charged adult prices for such things as train tickets, bus tickets, cinema tickets and various other things where the price was described as "adult", however they are unable to do things which are considered to be reserved for adults such as voting, drinking etc. We are petitioning the primeminister to bring in legislation to prevent companies charging people as adults desipte not being legally adults.

rejection.details: It is unclear what action you are requesting. Do you want the government to bring in legislation to make private companies whi have separate pricing structures for adults and children to clearly define adults as over 18s? Please re-submit your petition accordingly.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
